Burning the cd

Burning the distro

MS Windows

The ISO CD Image can be burned almost in any CD burning programm. Standard Windows XP built-in CD burner can’t do that.

  • Nero Burning Rom 5: Start, close Wizard, choose menu File - Burn Image, click on ISO file.
  • Nero Burning Rom 6: Start, close Wizard, choose menu Recorder - Burn Image, click on ISO file.
  • If no tool is installed you can download this: Small CD Writer (380 KB) and burn the image with it.

DO NOT unpack the image and burn the files from it - this CD will not boot.

FreeBSD

burncd -f /dev/acd0 data name-of-ISO-file fixate

where “/dev/acd0” - is the name of your CD Burner, “name-of-ISO-file” - the name of Frenzy ISO

Possible problems

  • Some CD Drives do not support boot form RWs.
  • Sometimes when the image is burned on RW, the system does not boot. To fix that - fully erase CD RW and then burn the image back.
